snippet.title: Puzzle Pelago Steam Trailer (Puzzle Game, 2020)
snippet.description:
Puzzle Pelago will be out on Steam April 30th!

Get it here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1064540/Puzzle_Pelago__A_Drag__Drop_Economy/

Learn More:
https://www.puzzlepelago.com

Puzzle Pelago is a puzzle game about rebuilding the economy of a devastated archipelago.
With its innovative, super easy to learn game mechanics, it turns the genre of ware-chain based economy simulations into a challenging puzzle! 

Puzzle Pelago is the commercial game debut by Christopher Mielack / Hallgrim Games.

Social Media:
https://discord.gg/puzzlepelago
https://twitter.com/HallgrimGames
https://twitter.com/puzzlepelago
https://www.facebook.com/hallgrimgames

About the Channel:
Subscribe for more updates about the games development (hopefully coming soon ;)!

Keys:
Want to make a video about the game and need a key?  media@puzzlepelago.com
